description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Sepang, Malaysia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Malaysia Sepang Five-Star Resort Along the Beachfront
hotels.description: In the form of a palm tree extending out into the ocean, Avani Sepang Goldcoast Resort epitomises paradise with its beachfront location and Polynesian-style overwater villas. Sun-soaked days can be spent swimming in the infinity pool or relaxing with a signature massage or body scrub at AvaniSpa. If you have little ones in tow, make their day by dropping them off at AvaniKids club for supervised fun. Meanwhile, the four exceptional dining venues are sure to satisfy any craving.

hotels.vendor_name: Holiday Inn Sepang Airport, an IHG Hotel
hotels.title: Malaysia City Break near Kuala Lumpur International Airport & Sepang International Circuit
hotels.description: Touch down into Kuala Lumpur layover convenience with a stay at Holiday Inn Sepang Airport, an IHG Hotel, perfectly located just moments from the city’s international Grand Prix circuit and Kuala Lumpur International Airport. After days spent exploring the city’s best, return to The Garden Cafe for easy-going local plates, Pitstop for cocktails and craft beers or head to the hotel’s wonderful outdoor pool and laze the afternoon away.

seo.title: Hoteles en Sepang - Malaysia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Sepang, Malaysia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
